[[File:FletchingFlag.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
Fletchers can craft Bows and Arrows for Archers, using Wood and Feathers as materials. Because of the high demand for boards, [[Lumberjacking]] and [[Carpentry]] work well with Fletching. Due to the frequency of [[Champion Spawns]] and [[Random Dungeon Adventure|Random Dungeon Adventures]], archers are very common and the demand for Arrows is frequent. Bows can also be crafted using the special woods produced from [[Lumberjacking]].

Fletching has Power Scrolls which allow the skill to be increased to 105, 110, 115 and finally 120. Currently these can only be obtained from [[Monster Contracts]]. The higher your Fletching  the better your chance at creating Exceptional and Slayer weapons.  [[Slayer Deeds]] can be applied to crafted wood weapons as long as they are exceptional and have at least two other modifiers.
 
You must craft in the [[Britain Crafting Area]] to have a chance to create [[Slayer Types]] weapons.

==Woods==
A Fletchers standard materials are boards harvested with [[Lumberjacking]]. Of those boards, there are different types which provide different bonuses and colors to crafted bows.

The skill levels a Fletcher requires to work with each type of board are:

==Rare Wood Bows and Crossbows==
Crafting with different wood types will give you a chance to add a damage, accuracy and durability modifiers. The following lists the ''highest possible'' durability, damage and accuracy modifiers for each type:

|-

| align="center" | Substantial / Might/ +10
|-

|-

| align="center" | Indestructible/ Vanquishing / +25
|-

== Recommended Training==
:0.0-40: Buy from NPC
:40-60: Bows
:60-80: Crossbows
:80-100: Heavy Crossbows
